additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Carbonated Water, Sugar, Acidity Regulators (Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate), Taurine, Guarana Extract (0.12%), Flavours, Preservatives (Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate), Caffeine, Glucuronolactone, Colour (Caramel IV), Vitamins (Niacin (B3), Pantothenic Acid (B5), B6, Riboflavin (B2), B12), Antioxidant (Ascorbic Acid).

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Product contains caffeine. This product is not recommended for children, pregnant or lactating women or individuals sensitive to caffeine.

additionalProperty.name: Country Of Origin
additionalProperty.value: MADE IN NEW ZEALAND OR AUSTRALIA FROM LOCAL AND IMPORTED INGREDIENTS

description: V Blue Guarana Energy Drink is a formulated caffeinated beverage. Crack open a can of motivation. You got this!
name: Blue Energy Drink 6x330mL Cans
